metadata.synopsis: Dialogue of the mother of a refugee family living in the merchant's house.

0.speaker: Marpha Golewits
0.text: Does he think we've gotten this far only to give up without a fight?

1.speaker: Marpha Golewits
1.text: Good thing you sorted that out - I was this close to chucking a knife right between that trollop's eyes.
1.context: NodeContext: Pleased - but clearly more than willing to act to protect her family if needs be

2.speaker: Marpha Golewits
2.text: Heartless scum. I'm a reasonable woman - we could easily work something out in a house this big.
2.context: NodeContext: Bitter/quiet anger; ready to protect her family

3.speaker: Marpha Golewits
3.text: I think I'll still keep something sharp by the door - just in case.
